name: MEC World Tour Handle Bar Bag
description: Keep your sunscreen, jacket, snacks and maps accessible on tours or long rides. A top window lets you see the map so you won’t miss the turnoff to the pub. Based on member feedback, we've given this version of the World Tour Handlebar bar bag a more streamlined shape and an updated top pocket design with a water-resistant zipper.Made of water-resistant PU-coated high-tenacity polyester.German-engineered low-profile Rixen and Kaul handlebar adapter attaches bag securely to bike.Smooth-running YKK zippers use U-shaped pulls that are easy to grab with gloves on.Lid opens away from you for easy access.Clear top pocket closes with a water-resistant zipperZippered mesh pockets under the lid holds small items.Bartacked webbing side loops let you attach your own bungee cord or hook on a shoulder strap (not included).Reflective front panel adds nighttime visibility.
